CVXR 0.99.5

  • Changelog

Parts of an Expression

expression-parts.Rd

List the variables, parameters, or constants in a canonical expression.

variables(object)

parameters(object)

constants(object)

Arguments

object

A Canonical expression.

Value

A list of Variable, Parameter, or Constant objects.

Examples

m <- 50
n <- 10
beta <- Variable(n)
y <- matrix(rnorm(m), nrow = m)
X <- matrix(rnorm(m*n), nrow = m, ncol = n)
lambda <- Parameter()

expr <- sum_squares(y - X %*% beta) + lambda*p_norm(beta, 1)
variables(expr)
#> [[1]]
#> Variable(10, 1)
parameters(expr)
#> [[1]]
#> Parameter(1, 1, sign = UNKNOWN)
constants(expr)
#> [[1]]
#> Constant(CONSTANT, UNKNOWN, (50,10))
#> [[2]]
#> Constant(CONSTANT, UNKNOWN, (50,1))
#> [[3]]
#> Constant(CONSTANT, POSITIVE, (1,1))
lapply(constants(expr), function(c) { value(c) })
